entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Red Deer
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:20 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Red Deer Regional Airport 12:48 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -0.6°C
Pressure: 98.6 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -0.7°C
Wind: E 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of freezing rain or snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to periods of snow or freezing rain this afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. High plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow or freezing rain ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
